TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_05_LV2_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Emilia's block skill lose 10% movement speed and receive @magical damage@ over time equal to 75% of Emilia's attack power per second for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_05_LV3_SUBDESC.text: Enemies hit by Emilia's block skill lose 15% movement speed and receive @magical damage@ over time equal to 150% of Emilia's attack power per second for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_DESC.text: Beatrice summons a 'Magic Tome' that deals area @magical damage@ equal to [400/450/500]% of her attack power, according to the chain number used. The 'Magic Tome' lasts 5 seconds before disappearing.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_LV2_SUBDESC.text:
Beatrice does not recover her own SP by using her block skill.
Instead, for every enemy hit by her block skill, Beatrice regenerates 1 SP for the ally leader, and 1 SP for herself.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_RZ_06_LV3_SUBDESC.text:
Beatrice does not recover her own SP by using her block skill.
Instead, for every enemy hit by her block skill, Beatrice regenerates 1 SP for the ally leader, and 1 SP for herself. Additionally, enemies standing on the area of her 'Magic Tome' lose 10% of their armor and resistance. (This debuff cannot be stacked.)

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_DESC.text:
Using blocks summons members of Team Urako for 5 seconds each in the following order: [Tsune/Tenko/Nue]. If members of Team Urako are already summoned, the duration of 'Team Urako!' is renewed. 'Team Urako' ignores enemy effects that absorb damage in place of their allies.
- Team Urako!
Tsune: A cute fox spirit.
Tenko: Tenko throws his feathers toward the frontmost enemy every 2 seconds to deal @magical damage@ equal to 800% of Urako's attack power.
Nue: Nue throws fireballs toward the frontmost enemy to deal @magical damage@ equal to [400/700/1300]% of Urako's attack power, according to the chain number used.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_LV2_SUBDESC.text:
If members of Team Urako are summoned, they additionally cast the below buffs:
Tsune: Increases own critical damage by 30%
Tenko: Increases own resistance penetration by 1000
Nue: Increases own attack power by 30%

TEXT_SKILL_WI_URAKO_LV3_SUBDESC.text:
If members of Team Urako are summoned, they additionally cast the below buffs: 
Tsune: Increases own critical damage by 30%
Tenko: Increases own resistance penetration by 1000
Nue: Increases own attack power by 30%
If the entirety of Team Urako is summoned, the values of the buffs are doubled.

TEXT_SKILL_WI_WOLFRAM_DESC_S2EP3.text: The Hero throws the nearest enemy into the air and summons a wind that deals @magical damage@ equal to [100/200/350]% of the Hero's attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_5_29_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) With every 'Mark of the Night Raven' affecting the enemy, Ran's attack speed is increased by 20%. Each 'Mark of the Night Raven' additionally decreases the affected enemy's armor by 5%. (Maximum 6 stacks)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_22_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Mark of Mana' is increased by 3 seconds. The marked enemy's evasion decreases by additional 20 and the enemy receives additional 30% damage from Genevie.
(Passive Added) If a marked enemy receives 3 hits by 'Chaser's Arrow', she shoots 'Chaser's Arrowstorm' that deals widespread magical damage equal to 2000% of Genevie's attack power. 'Chaser's Arrowstorm' decreases the subject's armor and resistance by 50% for 8 seconds, and dispels all buffs. (Cooltime: 1 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_23_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Bleeding' attack power +200%, duration +3 seconds, heal debuff +50%
(Passive Added) If the enemy is above a certain distance from the ground, Panpan shoots 5 shafts of 'Heaven's Bamboo Rain' that deal magical damage equal to 500% of his attack power and stun hit enemies. If multiple enemies meet this condition, Panpan attacks only the rearmost enemy. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_24_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) Arachne's 'baby spiders' ignore enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies.
(Passive Added) If a 'baby spider' accurately deals a hit, Arachne summons a 'Tarantula' that deals physical damage equal to 1000% of Arachne's attack power, giving the target enemy a 'spider bite.' Arachne additionally recovers HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt by the 'Tarantula.' If the enemy is under the effect of a debuff, the 'Tarantula' deals additional damage equal to 1000% of Arachne's attack power. If the 'Tarantula' accurately deals a hit, Arachne generates 1 block of her own. The 'Tarantula' ignores enemy effects that take damage in place of their allies. (Cooltime: 0.7 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_25_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Each 'fission bomb' deals physical damage equal to 500% of Lindsey's attack power. Additionally, the number of thrown fission bombs is increased to 3, and their range is increased by 100%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_26_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Ocean's Tears' deals magical damage equal to 1000% of Haerang's attack power.
(Passive Added) Upon using her own block after another ally's 3-chain, Haerang transforms into the 'Oracle of Water' for 20 seconds. In this state, Haerang cannot be stunned. (Cooltime: 20 seconds)
(Passive Added) As the 'Oracle of Water,' Haerang's normal attacks and block skills are activated as 'Oracle's Arrow.'
- 'Oracle's Arrow': Haerang shoots 4 'Oracle's Arrows' at the frontmost enemy that each deal magical damage equal to 500% of her attack power. All 'Oracle's Arrows' activated by Haerang's block skills are acknowledged as 1-chains.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_28_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) The damage dealt by 'Serpent Venom' is increased to 400% of Malkah's attack power per second. The cooltime and stack limit of the attack remain unchanged.
(Passive Added) Every time she uses her Special Skill, Malkah generates her own and the leader ally's block. If Malkah is the leader, she generates only one of her own. Additionally, enemies under the effects of 'Serpent Venom' receive magical damage equal to 2000% of Malkah's attack power every time they receive a buff. (Cooltime: 1 second)
(Passive Altered) Upon using another ally's 3-chain, Malkah immediately uses 'Fang of the Kukulkan.' 'Fang of the Kukulkan' deals magical damage equal to 2000% of Malkah's attack power, applies the effects of 'Serpent Venom,' and ignores enemy resistance by Malkah's resistance. 'Fang of the Kukulkan' also cancels all enemy buffs. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_CHA_6_29_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) With every 'Mark of the Night Raven' affecting the enemy, Ran's attack speed is increased by 20%. Each 'Mark of the Night Raven' additionally decreases the affected enemy's armor by 5%. (Maximum 6 stacks)
(Passive Added) Upon using a block skill, Ran summons an 'Illusion of the Night Raven' that copies Ran's every move for 12 seconds. Ran's auto attacks are changed to 1-chain block skills for the duration of 'Illusion of the Night Raven.' (Cooltime: 12 seconds)
(Passive Added) Upon dealing a critical hit to an enemy affected by 'Mark of the Night Raven' during the 'Illusion of the Night Raven,' Ran uses 'Illusion Blade' to deal area physical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power to the marked enemy and their surroundings. (Cooltime: 1 second)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_GS_06_4_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) High Elf Archer's evasion and accuracy are increased by an additional 25.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_GS_06_5_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) High Elf Archer's evasion and accuracy are increased by an additional 25.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_BO_GS_06_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) High Elf Archer's evasion and accuracy are increased by an additional 25.
(Passive Added) If the enemy hit by High Elf Archer's block skill is under a buff, High Elf Archer immediately shoots a 'Curve Shot' at the enemy with the least remaining HP. 'Curve Shot' deals physical damage equal to 3000% of High Elf Archer's attack power and ignores enemies' abilities of receiving the party's damage in their stead. (Cooltime: 3 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_22_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Enemy Detection Beam' deals twice the damage.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_24_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon activating his block skill, Jet's accuracy increases by 15 for 5 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_25_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) The duration of 'Radiance of the Battlefield' is increased by 2 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_28_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) Upon using 'Noblesse Oblige,' Cindy increases her own critical chance and accuracy by 30%.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_GU_CHA_4_7_DESC.text: When No.9's block skill deals a critical hit, No.9 immediately uses 'Jamiel's Hunt' to deal physical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power and stun the enemy for 1 second. This attack always lands critically and ignores all enemy evasion.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_FOURTH_REDNAS_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Grancian Shield Combat' grants 25% damage reduction. Lednas receives all damage targeted at the entire party. This effect cannot be cancelled.
(Passive Added) Upon using 'Grancian Shield Combat,' Lednas immediately activates 'Crest of Protection,' which grants herself 50% damage reduction for 3 seconds. (Cooltime: 12 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_01_4_DESC.text: (Passive Added) When he or other allies receive 10 hits, Goblin Slayer increases his own damage reduction and critical chance by 30% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_01_5_DESC.text: (Passive Added) When he or other allies receive 10 hits, Goblin Slayer increases his own damage reduction and critical chance by 30% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_01_6_DESC.text: (Passive Added) When he or other allies receive 10 hits, Goblin Slayer increases his own damage reduction and critical chance by 30% for 10 seconds. Upon using his chain 10 times, Goblin Slayer uses 'Gate Scroll' to deal neutral damage equal to 3000% of his attack power. (Cooltime: 8 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_07_4_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Spearman's Strike' decreases hit enemies' armor and resistance by 10% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_07_5_DESC.text: (Passive Enhanced) 'Spearman's Strike' decreases hit enemies' armor and resistance by 10% for 10 seconds.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_GS_07_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) 'Spearman's Strike' is changed to 'Strongest Strike of the Borderlands.'
Strongest Strike of the Borderlands: After using another ally's block within 5 seconds of using his own block skill, Spearman deals physical damage equal to 1500% of his attack power over the entire area of his range, and generates 1 leader ally block. Hit enemies lose 30% of their armor and resistance for 10 seconds. During 'Strongest Strike of the Borderlands,' Spearman gains knockback resistance.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_RZ_02_4_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon using Crusch Karsten's 3-chain during 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication,' Crusch uses 'Hundred Man Sword Strike' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1800% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_RZ_02_5_DESC.text: (Passive Added) Upon using Crusch Karsten's 3-chain during 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication,' Crusch uses 'Hundred Man Sword Strike' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1800% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_RZ_02_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Added) Upon using Crusch Karsten's 3-chain during 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication,' Crusch uses 'Hundred Man Sword Strike' to deal #physical damage# equal to 1800% of her attack power. (Cooltime: 5 seconds)
(Passive Added) The buff granted by 'Divine Protection of Wind Indication' additionally increases attack power by 25%, critical chance by 15%, and accuracy by 10.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SH_01_4_DESC.text: (Passive Added) When the leader ally deals 2 hits, Raphtalia's block skill is changed to 'Hide Mirage' that deals neutral damage equal to [500/600/700]% of Raphtalia's attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SH_01_5_DESC.text: (Passive Added) When the leader ally deals 2 hits, Raphtalia's block skill is changed to 'Hide Mirage' that deals neutral damage equal to [500/600/700]% of Raphtalia's attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SH_01_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Added) When the leader ally deals 2 hits, Raphtalia's block skill is changed to 'Hide Mirage' that deals neutral damage equal to [500/600/700]% of Raphtalia's attack power. 
(Passive Enhanced) After using 'Downward Slice,' Raphtalia uses 'Leap Slice' to deal physical damage equal to 3000% of her attack power.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_4_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_5_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_SPR_TWILLY_6_DESC.text: Upon using another ally's 1- or 2-chain, Twillie responds by using her own 1- or 2-chain, respectively. If she is in 'Earth Shaker' mode, she also receives all damage targeted at the entire party. Additionally, her normal attack, 'Strike of Faith,' and 'Last Stand' are enhanced to each deal 30% more damage over a wider range.

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TNT_RANNO_4_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) After using 'Thud!' Ranno uses 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' to deal physical damage equal to 400% of Ranno's attack power every 0.1 seconds for a total of 3 seconds.
(Passive Added) After 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' ends, Ranno uses 'Don't Eat That!' to deal physical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power.
(Passive Added) Using an ally block during 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' will increase the damage dealt by 'Don't Eat That!' by 500% of Ranno's attack power [1/2/4] stacks, according to the chain number used (maximum 12 stacks).

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TNT_RANNO_5_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) After using 'Thud!' Ranno uses 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' to deal physical damage equal to 400% of Ranno's attack power every 0.1 seconds for a total of 3 seconds.
(Passive Added) After 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' ends, Ranno uses 'Don't Eat That!' to deal physical damage equal to 1000% of her attack power.
(Passive Added) Using an ally block during 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' will increase the damage dealt by 'Don't Eat That!' by 500% of Ranno's attack power [1/2/4] stacks, according to the chain number used (maximum 12 stacks).

TEXT_WEP_LEGEND_SW_TNT_RANNO_6_DESC.text:
(Passive Enhanced) After using 'Thud!' Ranno uses 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' to deal physical damage equal to 800% of Ranno's attack power every 0.1 seconds for a total of 3 seconds. Ranno and Rex cannot be knocked back or stunned for the duration of 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' This effect cannot be canceled.
(Passive Added) After 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' ends, Ranno uses 'Don't Eat That!' to deal physical damage equal to 2000% of her attack power.
(Passive Added) Using an ally block during 'Boom, Bang, Whack!' will increase the damage dealt by 'Don't Eat That!' by 1000% of Ranno's attack power [1/2/4] stacks, according to the chain number used (maximum 12 stacks).
